senses.synonym: guy: an informal term for a youth or man; 'a nice guy'; 'the guy's only doing it for some doll'; 'the poor sod couldn't even buy a drink' <i93129>

relations.target: AAVE: a nonstandard form of American English characteristically spoken by African Americans in the United States <i73106>
